results.definition: all of your experiences that determine how things appear to you
examples: for them demons were as much a part of reality as trees were

results.definition: the state of being actual or real
examples: the reality of his situation slowly dawned on him

results.definition: the state of the world as it really is rather than as you might want it to be
examples: businessmen have to face harsh realities

results.definition: the quality possessed by something that is real
